does it works with SXE tool?

Does it work on vista?

@ #1
Yes, works fine with SXE or any client side anticheat. It's a simple standalone, you just double-click. Theres no extra tools or programs to need to run to play.

@ #3
Yes, works on Vista. You may need to run it in compatibility mode.

The .exe for this torrent contains a trojan. Do not be deceived by the comments claiming it is clean, it is a common thing for the creator of the virus to use multiple accounts to make fake comments proclaiming it it clean and works.
The infected file is 'counter-strike.exe' with a generic trojan, there is no chance it is a mistaken detection, DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS OR TRUST THE OTHER COMMENTS, FIND ANOTHER CS 1.6 DOWNLOAD!
